item.title: Trump Media announces $6 billion merger with fusion company TAE Technologies; DJT stock soars 25%
item.description: Trump Media and Technology Group announced a merger agreement with fusion power company TAE Technologies valued at more than $6 billion.

item.title: Trump announces 'warrior dividend' of $1,776 to every U.S. soldier in prime-time speech
item.description: Trump highlighted his administration's efforts to seal the southern border, bring down costs and strengthen U.S. foreign policy.

item.title: Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell petitions to vacate sex crime conviction
item.description: The habeas petition by Ghislaine Maxwell comes two day before a deadline for the Department of Justice to release files about Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: FBI Deputy Director Dan Bongino is stepping down in January
item.description: Bongino had been selected by President Donald Trump for the high-profile law enforcement job despite him having no prior FBI experience.

item.title: Trump tariffs: Small businesses take on high-interest rate loans to cover new costs
item.description: Even if the Supreme Court rules Trump tariffs are illegal, high interest rates and fees on predatory loans are leaving some businesses facing years of...
